thrash

So many people switched from Tank-Sejuani to Mage-Sejuani, but building Sejuani as you would normally allowed her to blow people up *and* live to the end of the fight lol

You just had to establish a different mindset: Start Q-E-Q-W, max R > Q > E > W, and spam your dash like you're Riven on a caffeine drip! AoE-stun - slow - knockup - slow - knockup - dead - double - rinse - repeat - gg wp ez 10/10 Mordekaiser es #1

Add in a lane partner with a dash-stun like Gragas, and catching *anyone* becomes a free kill with the alternating stuns.

The program says the average number of kills for {{champion:113}}  in URF mode was ~10. Mine was ~16 haha

Someone report me for ragequitting 'Who's That Champion?'. I got to 4 and then chose Ezreal but since there were Ezreals on both teams it said "Wrong! The answer is Ezreal!". Uuuuggghh! He built armor pen and there was no tank on the other team, dagnabit!

You

{{champion:45}} Me?

Yes you have you ever wanted to play a cool rpg

{{champion:45}} No not really.

Well to bad the script says you do NOW SAY YES OR YOU GO BACK INTO THE CAGE!

{{champion:45}} Alright, alright yes I want to play an rpg. Can I go now.

NO! we still have the game so stay.

{{champion:45}} But why are we promoting a game about another game isn't that redundant.

Listen if you talk back one more time I'll have your ult turned into a skill shot.

{{champion:45}} No not that I'll be even less popular.

Then Listen.

{{champion:45}} Ok fine.

In an alternate time line-

{{champion:45}} Really your using that story line.

Were the evil being {{champion:17}} has taken control of Runeterra and it's up to you to stop him.

{{champion:45}} Really your using Teemo why not me I'm evil.

Yeah sure you are.

{{champion:45}} I am evil stop. 

Yeah and people play Quinn all the time.

{{champion:45}} She's viable, just unpopular. Besides I actually do evil things like kill people, torture, steal, blackmail, and litter.

Wow wow you litter

{{champion:45}} Yes the most evil thing right

Well it's settled then. You can play this game were you beat the crap out of that purple pest for ruining our planets soil.

{{champion:45}} WAIT WHAT! (gets taped on the shoulder)

{{champion:57}} I'll teach you to litter my mother's face.

{{champion:45}} OW GOD

In the end Beat the Crap out of Veigar became a number one seller in the hippe demographic. And Veigar was put in the hospital for 4 years.

The End
